snippet.title: Hackshot | Alpha Gameplay 1
snippet.description:
Try Steam Demo, or join Beta testing:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757450/Hackshot/

Join Beta testing and game discussions:
https://discord.com/invite/UkWe35Krf6

Hackshot is a twisted puzzle take on artillery games.
You are a hacker with the ability to craft unique projectiles, by mixing and matching different abilities, use your crafting imagination to solve problems in creative ways.

Hack the biggest tech corporation ever using a word document, in a fun story with a terabyte of good old internet scam, and a touch of cool cleverness.

Over 20 hours of shooting viruses and crashing security -
Optional content and Game modes triple the playtime above -
Open-ended levels, with multiple solutions per level -
Most levels have secret solutions only top players can find -
Over 7000 unique cyberballs to craft -
Hackers will hack you back -
No filler levels, No condescending tutorial levels, Just pure challenging fun -
